DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study estimate efficacy safety OSI-211 topotecan patient relapse epithelial ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Study OSI-211 vs. Topotecan Patients With Relapsed Epithelial Ovarian Cancer
DOC.criteria: Confirmed relapse ovarian cancer . Measurable disease great equal 20 mm ( great equal 10 mm spiral CT scan ) . One two prior regimen chemotherapy . At least one regimen must contain cisplatin carboplatin . At least three week since prior chemotherapy recovery related toxicity . At least four week since prior radiotherapy recovery related toxicity .
